name: Growth (kaypineda)
description:
My educational (WIP) game for my GAME 355 class! Learn the basics of coding while  growing your own garden!

This is the first game of this type I've ever done. This was an experience. Currently, the demo/tutorial level is playable.

Instructions:

  • Click on code blocks to add to sequence
  • Use the reset button to clear the entire sequence (currently no individual deletion :( )
